page.title: 04Dalton etc. Sports-by Jon.
page.content:
On the third Saturday in July this sports day is held on{Dalton Hall {Field.}The day begins with the fancy dress on{Whashton Green}and a panel of judges choose the winners. after this we all go home for lunch. At 1p.m. we all meet and start the races with the little ones first. There are the straight races followed by the obstacle course.
This year,{Gayles}team won the children's relay race and{Kirby Hill} won the adults relay which came as a surprise to us all. I came joint first in the egg throwing competition. The other events were:- sack, bean bag and three-legged races. A magician came and did some tricks. At the end we all went to the village hall for a disco.
